_comment: Palm Frugivore seed dispersal interactions at macroscales. See http://github.com/fgabriel1891/Palm-Frugivore_Interactions_Neo-Afrotropics for more information.
citation: Muñoz, G., Trøjelsgaard, K., & W.D. Kissling. 2018. A synthesis of animal-mediated seed dispersal of palms reveals distinct biogeographic differences in species interactions. Journal of Biogeography (in progress)
